description: All HENRI locations follow the same philosophy: minimalist, precise, and quiet confidence. Clean lines, soft lighting, and thoughtout materials — all designed to make you feel comfortable the moment you step in, and a little more like yourself when you step out!
locations: 01 Christianshavn, Torvegade | 02 Frederiksberg, Gl. Kongevej | 03 Frederiksberg, H.C. Ørstedsvej | 04 København K, Grønnegade | 05 Magasin, Kongens Nytorv | 06 Nordhavn, Århusgade | 07 Nørrebro, Elmegade | 08 Østerbro, Nordre Frihavnsgade

faq.question: Do you take walk-ins?
faq.answer: Yes, we accept walk-ins every day if there is space available.

faq.question: Do you accept card payments?
faq.answer: Yes, we accept all major debit and credit cards except american express.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: We kindly ask for at least 24 hours notice for any cancellations or rescheduling. Late cancellations or no-shows may be subject to a fee.

faq.question: Do you offer gift cards?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer gift cards that can be purchased in-store or online.

faq.question: how do i book an appointment
faq.answer: you can make a booking at anyone of our stores through our online booking system at https://henri.planway.com/?new_design=1.
